page.title: 09Social concerns (12)
page.content: A Domesday questionnaire was returned by 30 families. Some of the major{concerns}were{lack} of{sports facilities and parks}in the area and the{poor}standard of{roads.} Others mentioned the fact that there should be{hygiene restrictions on dogs in public places. Several people complained about{vandalism}and they also stated it was{unsafe}to go out at night. The{Harborne Walkway}is an example of this where at night there have been{muggings and gluesniffers } and even a murder! Some of the more interesting suggestions include the building of an underground rail system and the renovation of older buildings. The house belonging to one of the children in our class on the Calthorpe Estate won an award in 1980 because it had been beautifully renovated.
